fields.System.Title: Landing Zone blueprint or terraform
fields.System.Description:
Evaluate the CAF Migrate Landing Zone blueprint or the Terraform Landing Zone.

If the assumptions and decisions in that article align to your business and technical objectives, the blueprint/terrform landing zone can be used to build out your environment.
